search.name: WinRes
search.description:
WinRes will open a browser window of a specified size.
Examples:
winres 800 600 or winres /height:800 /width:600
will open a browser window that is 800 pixels wide and 600 pixels tall.
Optionally, specify a URL as the last argument:
winres 800 600 http://www.mysite.com or
winres http://www.mysite.com /w:800 /h:600
